Family Owned, Since 2006

FAMILY, FRIENDS & BEER

With over 50 TV's, live sports betting, music and family fun, JTAPS is a great place to watch the game with the family.

JTAPS opened in 2006, and since then, we've remodeled our local bar from front to back. We even built a new outside seating area. Come in today and try one our season beers on tap.
